name: Decode Reply Tool
author: Scott Smith

sections.description:
Add a simple, modern tool to your posts to allow your readership to reply to any post via Twitter or App.net with a simple click or tap. An @mention is composed to your account with the permalink of the post that is being replied to attached.

Now the conversation with your readers continues using your favorite Twitter or App.net app. Download the Decode Reply Tool today and take a look at the beautiful and modern theme, Decode.
sections.installation:
1. Upload decode-reply-tool.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or in the “Plugins” section of the WordPress admin interface.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Setup with your Twitter and App.net usernames in Appearances > Decode Reply Tool.
  4. Save your changes and enjoy!
sections.faq:
Do I have to have Decode to use this plugin?

Absolutely not! The Decode Reply Tool is designed with Decode in mind, but the concept could work with most other blog-style themes. Results may vary, of course because I can’t test it against all other themes.

Do I have to know how to code or edit my theme files?

Not at all! Decode is as simple as can be; you never need to look at a bit of code. Furthermore, the Decode theme, was designed specifically with this plugin in mind, so if you use that theme, you are certainly spared from messing around in code and theme files.
